8efc377c8be902ce0a6ac33f062ef934_bullet.sentence_str: She and her 11-year - old brother were in bed watching TV when a stray bullet came through the second - floor bedroom wall, pierced her right foot from sole to instep, and disappeared into the back wall of her closet. NEWLINE.
